lender.name: Angie
lender.loan_because: everyone should do it

lender.name: Robert & Maddy
lender.loan_because: of the golden rule.

lender.name: Deb
lender.loan_because: I want to see if one person can really make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I sell high school level books about architecture and drafting.

lender.name: rebecca
lender.loan_because: really dont have alot to lend. but this is a fantastic way to help someone help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I train thoroughbred race horses.

lender.name: Dianna
lender.loan_because: Helping others is the greatest personal satisfaction for me.
lender.occupational_info: Being a mother is the most challenging and rewarding job I'ver ever had. I also am on call for the schools to work with students, which I feel blessed to be able to do.

lender.name: wanda
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the lives of others, - anything is possible. Be the change.
lender.occupational_info: Support women and children in crisis.

lender.name: david
lender.loan_because: a leg up in life is better than a hand out!

lender.name: Elesha & Mike
lender.loan_because: "Because I have been given much, I too much give" are the lines of one of my favorite hymns. My husband and I are greatly blessed and Kiva gives us opportunities to help others in need. After recent visits to South Africa and another planned with our children in 2008, we know how blessed we are and want to help others when possible.
lender.occupational_info: Mike and I are involved in the selling of products and adminstration of these programs and finances of the business. Mike sells furniture in a retail outlet and I am the VP of a Equipment Manufacturing Company.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: I lend because I would want someone to lend to me if I needed it. I think many honest people are taken advantage of by other people and I want to try to help someone do what they can do to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I try to write screenplays that producers will like and buy from me so that they can make them into feature-length films.

lender.name: Milt & Betty
lender.loan_because: I'ts the right thing to do when we are so blessed.
lender.occupational_info: Everyone has their duty to do their part, no matter how smalll

lender.name: Randy
lender.loan_because: To help along the entrepreneurial spirit of people who are obviously trying to better their situation, but sometimes do not have the same opportunities to fulfill that spirit.
lender.occupational_info: Steel fence construction. Welding and fabrication

lender.name: Erika Villegas
lender.loan_because: i know that many of these people need this one opportunity to make a difference in their life and their families.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: Being an entrepreneur for 11+ years I realize the balance between hard work, dedication and inspired ideas along with the need for capital. I'd like to be in a position to help those where capital is non-existent.
lender.occupational_info: Investment analysis and education.

lender.name: Lynne
lender.loan_because: I want to take advantage of the sustainable and affordable opportunities we have to connect with and help each other globally
lender.occupational_info: Apart from going to school, I give city tours of Ottawa as a guide on a double decker bus.

lender.name: chantal
lender.loan_because: when i needed someone to help me, i had friends who readed out and without them i wouldn't be where i am today. so all i want to to do is help others to reach for their dreams when they need it most.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies build web sites, mostly large newspaper and tv media companies.

lender.name: Christie and Steve
lender.loan_because: We both love the idea of helping other people around the world achieving a loan so that they can help themselves.
lender.occupational_info:
Christie is a Speech Therapist who helps mostly elderly people re-learn to talk, eat, and think more clearly after they've had some medical problems.
Steve is a dispatcher for the trucking industry to move shipments around North America smoothly.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because:
helping a woman improves her, her family, her town, region, country and the world.
We are in this together; each of us should give help, no matter how small it seems.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I want to increase access to the equity to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I start important conversations between companies and customers.

lender.name: Mellony
lender.loan_because: I like to make others happy and I like to help people make their dreams come true. If I had more I would give more.
lender.occupational_info: I work for Crosby County in the Courthouse. I pay the county bills and do the payroll for several employees. I also help the auditor with the county budget. I work 40 hours a week at the courthouse, and spend the rest of my time at home with my husband, or doing things for my grandkids. My husband is David. He is a police officer. I have five children that are grown, and six grandchildren. We have two dogs for pets. Their names are Bosley and Kylie.

lender.name: Eleanor
lender.loan_because: I can't think of anything better to do than to help people who are trying to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am a research scientist and I work on Mycobacterium tuberculosis.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: I am lucky enough to be able to
lender.occupational_info: I advise small business owners in marketing, sales and operations.

lender.name: Aud
lender.loan_because: It's fun!
lender.occupational_info: Finance

lender.name: Lyn
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Nicholas
lender.loan_because: I get everything I want from my parents and I just wanted to help someone who didn't have a mom or dad who could give them everything they wanted or needed.
lender.occupational_info: I don't work yet. I am in the 5th grade at school. But I do get good grades .

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: I have the means to do so, and because of the impact it makes.
lender.occupational_info: help organizations and businesses run more efficiently and effectively

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of giving a hand up and that people feel better about themselves and their situations when they can support themselves and their family.
lender.occupational_info: I locate land near Universities for development of student housing.

lender.name: Reginald
lender.loan_because: because it feels good. There is no better feeling than helping someone harness their desires
lender.occupational_info: I assist persons on acquiring homes, starting businesses, taking trips and just starting over in life. I try to bring smiles to people faces.

lender.name: Krista
lender.loan_because: It's a way to change the world one random act of kindness at a time. I can afford to help and so I will do whatever I can to help those less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I am a stay at home mother of two. My husband is active duty U.S. Air Force.

lender.name: pat
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed. It is a selfish act that makes me feel good.

lender.name: Lynnea
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good to be able to help. I cant wait to see the businesses grow and I will be cheering them on from my computer.
lender.occupational_info: I arrange loans and sell insurance products from a car dealership.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: This is a good thing to do...it feels great to give.

lender.name: Kathryn
lender.loan_because: I love putting my money to use where it is most effective, and where I can see it working.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: It is money that I won't miss but will change the very life of another person. That person will impact the lives of their family who will inturn impact their community. It's amazing to think of the ripple effect a Kiva microloan will have.
lender.occupational_info: I help non-profits accept electronic forms of payment.

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: I have been very blessed and want to enable someone else to better their own life.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a tourism bureau, creating and editing content for our publications, website, and official documents.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: I have always been taught to give. I think this is an excellent opportunity to give to people around the world to help better their situation in life.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of my husband and son and our home.

lender.name: Jaden and Beckett
lender.loan_because: We all need to do what we can to make the world a better place for all.
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I own and run a small Inn and restaurant

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: I have the means and the desire to help people who are deserving. I love the concept of allowing someone to provide for themselves or their family with a small donation. I hope the money that I loan to these people will enable them to someday help someone else who is in need.

lender.name: Carmen
lender.loan_because: I am very blessed to be able to do so.

lender.name: Tre` & Dave
lender.loan_because: We live a very blessed life and are so thankful for that. Therefore, we want to lend a hand to those less fortunate.

lender.name: Jenifer
lender.loan_because: I want to change the world...this is how I can help now.
lender.occupational_info: 10+ years of experience in communications through community and public relations, branding strategies, social media & technology and event management.

lender.name: Elaine
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone deserves a life and that lending helps both the giver and receiver and helps create a world commuinity.
lender.occupational_info: I help inviduals and organizations develop in order to be healthier. I manage many conflicts.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: We are not put on this earth merely to take care of ourselves.
lender.occupational_info: Helping customers keep their computer networks secure from outside intruders.

lender.name: Carrie
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference
lender.occupational_info: I stay at home and take care of my daughter and our home.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I have a small art business - "peace by piece" - I design and create stained glass windows. Half of my proceeds are pledged to peaceful efforts. Promoting stable families helps to promote stable communities and supports peace in the area.
lender.occupational_info: I am an elementary school teacher - 5th grade - teaching language arts and fine arts. I try to model peaceful efforts for my students, in hopes that they will join in these efforts.

lender.name: carol
lender.loan_because: I know how difficult it is to operate a small business so if I can reach across the world to help in some small way then I do !
lender.occupational_info: craft person. I make ribbon flowers by hand to sell at craft fairs and shops(very small business)

lender.name: Jodi
lender.loan_because: It makes me happy to know that doing something this small can make a huge difference. Without a loan, my husband and I would have never been able to start our business and it gives me great joy to know that we can do that for someone else.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: It is a fabulous way to give a leg up to someone who is in need.

lender.name: Dawn Suiter
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it can be to get started with a small business. I also know it can be done with even small amounts of money. I want to help pay it forward and give others the opportunity to make their world a better place.

lender.name: Joyce
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do and the least I can do.
lender.occupational_info: I run my own business doing accounting for small businesses.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: We are in this world to serve others.
lender.occupational_info: Marketing Manager for my family's manufacturing company

lender.name: Tamara
lender.occupation: Co-Owner of a small Real Estate/Mortgage Co.
lender.occupational_info: Supporting my husbands dream. Office work, I do various jobs to keep the office running - LOTS of paperwork!

lender.name: Adrian
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student working to become a counselor.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I'm very fortunate to live in a country where it seems that most anything is possible. I love that Kiva allows me to provide people in developing areas with the tools they need to create their own opportunities through growing their own businesses. Giving people a hand up is simply the right thing to do and it's very rewarding!
lender.occupational_info: As a Realtor, I help people in Las Vegas, Nevada ,USA to buy and sell homes.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: To give a hand up to people less lucky than me.
lender.occupational_info: I sell test preparation software to schools and school systems.

lender.name: Margo
lender.loan_because: I believe we should all help each other. I believe this is God's plan for each and everyone of us, reach out and give to one another.

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: I want to promote growth which is sustainable economically, socially and environmentally and Kiva's bottom up approach allows this to be done easily, collaboratively and effectively.
lender.occupational_info: I am an Internet connectivity strategist and learning network consultant.

lender.name: Kathryn
lender.loan_because: I feel is our duty to help our fellow man in need. This website provides an amazing opportunity to do so.

lender.name: kasey
lender.loan_because: A little can do a lot!!!

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me in my life. I appreciate this opportunity to share these blessings with others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Lutheran pastor. I lead a congregation in Illinois, and I spend my days planning programs, preparing worship services, teaching and visiting members of my church.

lender.name: Kenn
lender.occupation: Electrical, Plumbing, HV AC, CIS and also CWC

lender.name: Chris Moerles
lender.loan_because: Because it's so simple to do, and the money comes back to me to help others.

lender.name: Nneka
lender.loan_because: I've been blessed enough to share.
lender.occupational_info: I deal with the ethics problems in a hospital.

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: It takes a village!
lender.occupational_info: I listen to people and try to help them figure out solutions to their worries.

lender.name: Spencer
lender.occupational_info: medical research for neurological diseases

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I've been so blessed to be able to open my own business in the USA and earn a good living for myself. I've been looking for a small way to bring that good fortune to someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I work for drug companies who are trying to make new medicines. I travel to different doctors' offices and make sure they are keeping the people who try these new medicines safe.

lender.name: Jack
lender.loan_because: I want to help others achieve a better life through helping them help themselves

lender.name: Theia
lender.loan_because: As a single mother of 3 teen-aged sons, God has blessed and allowed me to provide a comfortable lifestyle for the four of us. I am probably one paycheck away from poverty myself but it is due to my own fault and carelessness. I waste plenty of my money on frivolous things and have always wanted to make a difference where it was needed the most and would be appreciated. With the minimum of $25.00 a real difference and change for others across the world is possible. When I saw Kiva on Oprah I knew this was IT! A perfect way to give back. I knew that I didn't have millions like Bill Clinton, Agassi, nor Oprah, however, $25.00 now and a little more later, yes! It is our purpose in life to help one another to make this world a better place for all. I thank God, Oprah, and Kiva for the opportunity to do my part world-wide!
lender.occupational_info: I work in a hospital setting on an orthopaedic surgical unit. I am an integral part of helping patients regain their physical strength, mobility, and pain management. Normally, the days are 12-16 hours long. Most days it is mentally and physically challenging due to the racism and prejudices that face America. Other days it rewarding to see the smiles and gratitude of the patients / family member's lives myself and my co-workers have touched by restoring optimal health and a safe return home for them regardless of the obstacles faced.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: I want to help facilitate success.
lender.occupational_info: I am living abroad with my husband and helping keep things organized in our home. I also do volunteer work in the community and love to travel.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: To give someone a chance to improve their life.
lender.occupational_info: I create artwork for businesses, the artwork helps them to sell their product.

lender.name: Terri
lender.loan_because: I believe showing faith in humanity raises us all up.
lender.occupational_info: I am dedicated to helping women and their families have healthy and beautiful birth experiences.

lender.name: Keith
lender.loan_because: I firmly believe that where there is prosperity, there is peace.
lender.occupational_info: I manage rental homes and properties.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: Sometimes good people need a little help to get started, so why not? I have spent far more on FAR less.
lender.occupational_info: I own and operate a facitlity that boards dogs/catsand small pets while their owners are away

lender.name: sue
lender.loan_because: Give a man a fish and he eats for a day, teach a man to fish and he eats for a lifetime.

lender.name: brittany
lender.loan_because: i can!

lender.name: jjstar
lender.occupational_info: I am a stay at home mother to our son...enjoying spending time watching him grow into a Christ following man.

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: I believe this is the most effective way of making the world a better place, one loan at a time.

lender.name: Diann
lender.loan_because: I love to help others in need.

lender.name: Danielle
lender.loan_because: I'd hope that if I was in the same situation, someone would do the same for me.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I know what it is like to struggle to support yourself. I am glad to help those less fortunate and wish I could do more.
lender.occupational_info: My work is very rewarding. I utilize my talent for color and style to assist people in selecting furniture for their homes.

lender.name: Carina
lender.loan_because: If we are fortunate enough to be able to, we should.

lender.name: Hugues
lender.loan_because: I can, and because everyone deserves a chance to have a decent life. Unlike our so called developped countries were credit has become abusive, loans on Kiva seem to serve a real and beneficial purpose.

lender.name: Courtney
lender.loan_because: I know what it is like to have someone believe in you and a cause.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the president of a company that deals in oil, real estate, andengine patents.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: of the Golden Rule.

lender.name: Judith
lender.loan_because: I have struggled to raise myself out of poverty. It was the help of other people that made it possible for me. I believe we are all in this together. I spent most of my life farming; I recently grduated from college with a degree in science education. I would have stayed with farming if I could have made a living so I will primarily loan to farmers. As a single mother I will also show preference for single Parents world wide.
lender.occupational_info: I teach science and art to high school students.

lender.name: Carlos
lender.whereabouts: Porto Alegre Rio Grande do Sul

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: My reason for getting involved in Kiva is best described with the following quote: "Do not wait for leaders; do it alone, person to person." -Mother Teresa

lender.name: Jean
lender.loan_because: I want to do good in the world and this is a sure way to help someone in need. Former President Bill Clinton talked about Kiva on the Oprah show. This is a legit business.

lender.name: Beth & Paul
lender.loan_because: We like to help people who are trying to better their lives and the lives of their families.

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.occupation: mother, fabric artist and oh so much more
lender.loan_because: I think the idea of reaching out a hand to help around the world is a wonderful thing.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mother and I sew blankets that are also pieces of art

lender.name: Jena
lender.loan_because: I want to teach my children that the world is a huge place but they can still make a difference.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I want to give others a chance to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: All types of planning for, Parks and Open Space, Land Development, City Master Plans and others.

lender.name: Lorraine
lender.loan_because: I'm grateful for what I have and see the desparate need of others.The same need my father had in 1911, when he came from Italy to the U.S
lender.occupational_info: retired senior lady. I do my own gardening and vegetable planting. Also volunteer work at our Italian social club.

lender.name: Summer
lender.occupation: Mother of three boys under four!

lender.name: Carlos
lender.loan_because: I truly believe in the "The Golden Rule" a fundamental moral principle found in virtually all major religions and cultures, which simply means "treat others as you would like to be treated." It is arguably the most essential basis for the modern concept of human rights. Help individuals with the tools required to succeed and they will !
lender.occupational_info: Retired after serving my country for 21 years with HONOR, DIGNITY and PRIDE .

lender.name: woode
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel good.....
lender.occupational_info: i spread love.....

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.loan_because: Through Kiva, I can help people and feel like I am having a direct impact on their lives. And it simply makes me feel good to help!

lender.name: TERI
lender.loan_because: I believe it is the Lord 's will for us to give and to help others and I want to help make a difference in someone's life.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: What a neat thing to get to be a part of. I've needed a loan before, it helped. It's a gift to get to help someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I write for television shows, I also perform comedy by myself and with groups.

lender.name: Micheryl
lender.loan_because: This is my way of giving back.
lender.occupational_info: I have an online eBay store.

lender.name: Marjorie
lender.loan_because: Its important to me to be part of the solution.

lender.name: Roxanne
lender.occupation: Registered Nurse, Critical Care Education Speciali

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I believe we are all on this lifeboat we call Earth, together. If we do not work together and help each other, we will never make any progress.
lender.occupational_info: I provide materials for science teachers to help make the study of science more interesting to their students.

lender.name: DE&DE
lender.loan_because: We believe in the power of microfinance to make a positive impact in the lives of deserving recipients.

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: What a wonderful way to give! As little as $25 can make an impact on someone's life! Give because you can!

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: God has Blessed me and it is my honor to be a Blessing to others.

lender.name: Mendy & Stuart
lender.loan_because: We are the sum total of our past but we are not held captive to it.

lender.name: Monique
lender.loan_because: I want to help people!

lender.name: Sherry
lender.loan_because: I think we can all make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I own and operate a very small ladies gym.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: We all need help sometimes . . . if we each helped each other we'd live in a perfect world . . . I'm far from perfect but I'm working at it! I'm grateful for the opprotunity to help. Thank you.
lender.occupational_info: I work in Invasive Cardiology managing the operating rooms that do Cardiac Catheterization. We use X-rays to see inside the heart and internal catheters to see the heart from the inside. We fix broken hearts!

lender.name: Laurel & family
lender.loan_because: If I can be of help to someone who needs it, how can I not help.

lender.name: Teresa
lender.loan_because: I used to be poor, but I'm not anymore!
lender.occupational_info: I design and sell logo jewelry for Big Brothers Big Sisters of America....a wonderful not-for-profit organization.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I want others to have a better life.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: I think this is the right way to help out people in need: with respect.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the translation field.

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: To help alleviate poverty, to empower someone to better their life and living conditions, and because I am grateful and thankful for what I have and am fortunate to be in a position to share,...even if only a little.
lender.occupational_info: I teach art history at a large university in the United States. I teach my students that all art is an expression and reflection of the culture that made it, and to approach all art with an attitude of respect.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: Because We Must

lender.name: Molly
lender.loan_because: it is the least I can do to help a hard worker.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: Because I support entrepreneurship throughout the world, and I believe one of the best ways to end poverty is to help those in need with the tools to better their own situations. Kiva puts the power into the hands of the people, not the government.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an attorney practicing in Intellectual Property Law and Business Law.

lender.name: Don and Diane
lender.loan_because: We want to give back.
lender.occupational_info: retired State of California employees

lender.name: Priscilla
lender.loan_because: "You must be the change you want to see in the world." ---Ghandi

lender.name: Sonia, Darrell & Austin
lender.loan_because: God has blessed us and our family.

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: I know it is the best way to help people. I want to help them build onto their own lives.
lender.occupational_info: I sell businesses to people who want to be in business for themselves.

lender.name: Ruwani
lender.loan_because: These small business entrepreneurs are trying to improve their lot in life with hard work and dedication. Even with a small amount of money I can make a difference. I am glad to be able to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I help people finance their homes. If they want to purchase a property, I find the money (from banks) to lend to them. If they want to change their current loan on their property, I find better financing for them.

lender.name: Bobbie and Jim
lender.loan_because: We have lived in third world countries, know the need and support free enterprise.
lender.occupational_info: We are retired, but still are very active and love to travel. Love to meet and be of help when and where we can.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: Want to help less fortunate
lender.occupational_info: I work at an airport

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: We are all one family.

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: Giving is one of the most important things we can do on this earth for others. It is such a joy watching people's dreams come true.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I loan because from the success of the small business, the seeds of economic and governmental stability will grow. I wish I could do more.

lender.name: Kosta & Wiebke
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have the opportunity to better themselves.

lender.name: Paula
lender.loan_because: I worry about women's rights and survival around the world and want all to know that Americans do care.
lender.occupational_info: I spent 45 years of my life educating children of all ages to respect themselves and others and guiding them toward becoming productive and caring citizens of the world.

lender.name: DAWN
lender.loan_because: it will make a difference to peoples lives

lender.name: Laurie & Braeden
lender.loan_because: Just "paying it forward"...

lender.name: anthony
lender.loan_because: I believe that giving someone a small amt of money and if they have the desire and follow through to operate a business they will succeed. Just as I did.
lender.occupational_info: I worked with persons with special needs assisting them to become as independent and capable individuals as possible.

lender.name: Katelin
lender.loan_because: I like the people and their stories.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school.

lender.name: nancy & mike
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: It is a good way to remember that we are all part of one world community.

lender.name: Aisha
lender.loan_because: in order to make a difference it's starts with you

lender.name: Stevens Family
lender.loan_because: We believe in the universal law of reciprication... what you send out into the universe comes back to you. And to whom much is given much is expected.
lender.occupational_info: We sell, install and maintain wood athletic flooring (basketball courts/gym floors)

lender.name: Marianna
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I fundraise for my alma mater, Loyola Marymount University. Go Lions!

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: I want to share my success and good fortune with others that are less fortunate and need a helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: I help large banks and telecommunication companies with their business systems.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: I want to see other Mom's in the world succeed in raising their children the best way they can. With help they can give their children the ability to be in school and have a better life for the future. This makes me feel good inside to be able to help like this in this big world that we all share!!! :)
lender.occupational_info: I am retired now from raising my family. My son Michael is 32 and daughter Amy is 29. They are through college and have great jobs. My husband is retired too from being an airline pilot for years. We live in Carlsbad California and have been married for 34 years. I sold real estate after my children grew up and went off to college and just retired now. My husband and I want to help other Mom's raise their children in far away countries and help them to go to school so their future can be successful in every way possible. I think all mothers and fathers want this for their children no matter where they live and what their circumstances are. I am happy to be able to help !!! :) Keep Smiling !!!! :)

lender.name: Margot
lender.loan_because: I really want to encourage people to follow their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I help people to plan financially for when their loved ones die and they are left in debt.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: My class has been learning about people in need and I saw the Oprah Show and thought it would be a good idea to help.
lender.occupational_info: I don't work yet i'm just a 5th grader

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers to design web pages and logos, as well as printed material.

lender.name: Dianne
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with a good life. I want to be able to share and help others in any way that I can.
lender.occupational_info: I teach 6 year old children in an elementary school.

lender.name: Baynesey.
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Married with a daughter, live and work in NY.

lender.name: natalie
lender.loan_because: I believe in self reliance, and helping the poor.

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: I want to help others and at the same time educate my 5 year old boys on what life is like for people in other countries.
lender.occupational_info: Selling Schlafly Beer to various businesses and through promotions and tastings.

lender.name: Antonette and Rigo
lender.loan_because: We appreciate how just a little help can be a huge boost. We get enormous satisfaction from assisting others in our own very small way. Their individual success is ours as well.
lender.occupational_info: I sell network services like internet connections to businesses.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: It helps to retain the dignity of an individual. Those who are given a helping hand will generally do the same in return.
lender.occupational_info: Retirement affords the luxury of volunteering my services.

lender.name: Joyce
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance!

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: I want to help people do the work that they want to do and to help their families have more secure lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired teacher with a great love for my childen and grand and great grandchildren, and want to help other people enjoy their lives and be safe.

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: I admire the determination of people to suceed.
lender.occupational_info: I hand paint old furniture giving it new life

lender.name: Diana
lender.loan_because: It's such an easy way to give back. I like making a difference for someone.
lender.occupational_info: I own a medical case management company in Indianapolis. We coordinate medical care for injured workers and employees who are undergoing surgical procedures.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: I would like to help someone who is willing to do something to help them self.
lender.occupational_info: i am presently in school to be a nurse. i hope when i graduate i will be able to also give of my service as a nurse to help people in need.

lender.name: Mark CDT
lender.loan_because: I think this is a wonderful way to help others who don't have the same fortunate circumstances as us.
lender.occupational_info:
I am a member of the Kiva Lending Team - Crazy Canucks.
Please join us !!!

lender.name: leonida
lender.loan_because: I want to assist others in their ventures and growth
lender.occupational_info: export cars, equipment to 3rd countries

lender.name: Diana
lender.loan_because: I'm blessed in so many ways and want to give back some of what I've received

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: To help change someone's life for what I might pay for a tank of gas in the US? It's a blessing that KIVA exists and it's a blessing to participate.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a large retail staff for a local bank.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I think when you give to others you get back so much more in return. :-)

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: Helping others helps everyone. Plus, I like to see people succeed and find joy in their lives.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: I think this is an awesome opportunity to help make a direct difference in someone's life. I don't have much but this is an opportunity for me to do something for others on this planet.
lender.occupational_info: I am a web designer. I do whatever I can to help the people in my town.

lender.name: Robert Day & AJ Northrop
lender.loan_because: We loan because we want to make a difference in the world. We discovered KIVA when watching Oprah and decided that this was an option worth exploring. The fact that we can make affordable loans and donations to those who will benefit from it in a way that will not only assist them in supporting themselves and their families but maybe even have a lasting impact on an entire community and way of life. And do it with what we consider a very small investment.
lender.occupational_info: One of us works for a High End Tradtional Mens and Womens Clothing Company (almost 200 years old) and the other works for the Premier Coffee Purveyor and Roaster in America.

lender.name: Cathy & Russell
lender.loan_because: We loan because we can! It is great to be in a position that we can help others.
lender.occupational_info: Cathy - nursing educator Russell - teacher We both try to make the world a better place by helping learners to help others.

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people help themselves.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I have plenty to sustain my life and wish to help others pursue their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I help hospitals in Tennessee provide better patient care by performing process improvements.

lender.name: diane
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people who are working to help themselves

lender.name: Helen
lender.loan_because: I do this for a selfish reason--it makes me feel "good" to know I have helped someone.
lender.occupational_info: Before retirement, I taught children in high school.

lender.name: dawn
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mother of a special-needs child, and am lucky that I CAN stay home with her.

lender.name: Brenna
lender.loan_because: I know how good I have it and I know that I need to give back.

lender.name: Diana
lender.loan_because: I love seeing the power of coming together to make something happen, and being a philanthropist for $25...

lender.name: Danielle
lender.loan_because: Together we can make a difference.

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: we each have a responsibility to make this a better world and help others in need.

lender.name: Zoe
lender.loan_because: I think it is important to give everyone a hand up instead of a hand out.
lender.occupational_info: I work to make a safe and environmentally friendly work site protecting everyone who works in our manufacturing plant

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: i want to help people that want to help themselves. if i have some extra money why not help others that need it for something that will help themselves and their families
lender.occupational_info: i work in an office on a university. i am a secretary in a way...but with many more responsibilities than your average secretary,

lender.name: Nina
lender.loan_because: I come from a third world country (El Salvador) and grew up poor. The sacrifice my parents made coming to the United States provided an incredible opportunity such as a college education to succeed. I want to give back a little of what has been given to me. Kiva allows me to lend a "hand" to those who are still struggling.
lender.occupational_info: I market wireless products (cell phones) for the Hispanic market in Arizona and New Mexico. My work involves advertising, community involvement, merchandising and reporting.

lender.name: Brianne
lender.loan_because: There are seasons in human affairs, when new depths seem to be broken up in the soul, when new wants are unfolded in multitudes and a new and undefined good is thristed for. There are periods when to dare is the highest wisdom!
lender.occupational_info: Study, study, study, sleep!!!! Study, study, study, study, sleep!!!!

lender.name: Kenna
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference somehow. I love having the chance to help people all over the world, over and over again!

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I like to know that I am helping somebody else achieve their dream. We are very lucky to be born in the U.S. and many people take that "luck" for granted. I think it should be appreciated and shared with others because we are no more deserving of it than anybody else.
lender.occupational_info: I review plans for new buildings and determine the cost to build them. I also look for errors and make sure what is drawn on the plans can actually be built.

lender.name: BECAUSE OF JESUS
lender.loan_because: of Jesus Christ and my strong desire to love and serve Him.
lender.occupational_info: My work is where ever Jesus leads me to serve Him.

lender.name: Kathy Jo
lender.loan_because: I hope to make a difference, I believe that if we all share positive energy we can change the world.
lender.occupational_info: Currently I am an interior designer but, my true passion is to be a shoe designer like Manolo Blahnik. I hope to one day use my success to make an even larger contribution to the causes that are dear to me.

lender.name: Debra
lender.loan_because: I am in a financial position to help others and giving is the best gift I give to myself, I also rescue dogs which is very rewarding as well as helping others in less fortunate situations. I feel very connected when I can help someone or a dog get the start to a better life.

lender.name: Dawn
lender.loan_because: I realize and understand that there are so many good people in the world who, due to circumstances beyond their control have not been able to enjoy the blessings I enjoy on a daily and ongoing basis. I would be so honored to help someone in their endeavors to better the lifes of themselves, their families and their communities. I know that anyone of us could be placed in the circumstances that other people find themselves in at anytime and would hope that someone would be available to extend help if needed.
lender.occupational_info: I am a nurse who works in a busy department of a local hospital.

lender.name: lucy
lender.loan_because: AFTER WATCHING Oprah Winfrey'S SHOW I JUST FELT IN MY HEART THAT I HAD TO MAKE A DIFFERENCE IN SOMEONE'S LIFE. So Here I am . All my life it has been very easy for me to help someone in need . It is such a rewarding feeling I highly recommend it !! I feel so blessed to be a part of helping someone make a difference in their life.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a Municipal court.

lender.name: Kristine
lender.loan_because: I want to help to make this world a better place for people in a less fortunately position that I.
lender.occupational_info: I am very grateful that my husband makes enough money that I am able to stay home and raise our children.

lender.name: Heidi and Tom
lender.occupational_info: Heidi helps plan changes and expansions to highways. Tom is a biological oceanographer helping companies plan construction projects that avoid impacts to shorelines and wetlands.

lender.name: Margo
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I need to be part of the change I want to see in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I manage property for those who have many advantages and options. But I am always aware that there are those whose options and advantages are limited.

lender.name: Jerry & Linda
lender.loan_because: we have been blessed in our lives and want to share in some small way with others who have not been as fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: We are both retired - I was in the insurance business and Linda managed a large customer call center.

lender.name: Justin & Kirk
lender.loan_because: We enjoy helping people who are trying to make their lives better.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: This lady is trying her best to make a difference in her life.
lender.occupational_info: Retired Registered Nurse

lender.name: Kitti
lender.loan_because: Paying it forward - someone helped me get started many years ago.
lender.occupational_info: Courthouse records research to determine ownership of property, then pay owners for leasing property for petroleum exploration.

lender.name: Kimberley
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to give and those that struggle the most deserve a chance at making their lives better. I am happy and grateful to help.
lender.occupational_info: I sell newly constructed homes to people in Houston, Texas

lender.name: Ilana
lender.loan_because: I believe in this.

lender.name: EDWARD
lender.loan_because: I AM IN NEED OF NOTHING. I HOPE SOME DAY WE CAN ALL SAY THAT! I ALSO WANT OTHERS IN THE WORLD TO KNOW AMERICANS ARE KIND AND LOVING PEOPLE. IT SEEMS WE'VE GOTTEN A BAD RAP OVER THE PAST FEW YEARS. IT'S PLAIN AND SIMPLY JUST THE RIGHT THING TO DO!
lender.occupational_info: I CARE FOR MY 86 YEAR OLD MOTHER WHO LIVES WITH MY PARTNER AND I. SHE NEEDS 24 HOUR A DAY SUPERVISION AND ASSISTANCE. SHE NOW SUFFERS FROM PROGRSSIVE DEMENTIA.. KIVA HELPS ME KEEP A BROADER FOCUS THAN MY LITTLE SPOT ON THE PLANET

lender.name: Jose
lender.loan_because: I want to help those that want to do something with their lives.

lender.name: Birgit
lender.loan_because: It's fun and it feels good. Besides a small amount of money can make a big difference in someone else's life. So why not?

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: I admire and envy anyone with the energy to open their own business and work hard to make it go!

lender.name: Tina
lender.loan_because: This is what our world needs more of, people who care enough to reach out to help with the success in the lives of others. How awesome is this!
lender.occupational_info: I work for a family owned transport company. I work in an office and my job consists of a variety of responsibilities to keep me motivated and busy.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I saw this on the Oprah show and think it's great. I think that we here in the US take so much for granted. I think it's great to help these people achieve their goals & dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I am lucky to to be able to stay home with my 2 young children. I think being home is actually harder work than actually having a "real" job.

lender.name: Ted
lender.loan_because: My turn.

lender.name: Auteema
lender.loan_because: Beacuse I'm blessed and I live by the motto: I have it worst than some, but better than most. So why not help someone, even someone that I don't know, reach their goals.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: Kiva is an amazing program.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student who leads a couple Human Rights groups

lender.name: Donn
lender.loan_because: I want to give back some of what I have been fortunate enough to receive.
lender.occupational_info: I lend money to people who want to buy a home. I also do wildlife rehabilitation to injured or orphaned wildlife.

lender.name: Cole
lender.loan_because: I want to help people.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I want to help others improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I teach in schools when the main teacher is absent because of sickness or vacation.

lender.name: KebehAkwafo
lender.loan_because: This loan is in the name of Ms. Kebeh Akwafo who departed us in 2007. So, that when her children come of age they can use this money to better their futures.
lender.occupational_info: Looking Down on my Children, Family and Friends.

lender.name: ann
lender.loan_because: my daughter Patricia Austin alerted me to this wonderful site
lender.occupational_info: arts writer and performance art critic

lender.name: Teresa
lender.loan_because: I want to help. I get student loans to attend school. Just wanted to help someone else get a step forward. The picture is my calf Ginger Snap when she was 3 months old.
lender.occupational_info: I am going to college to become a nurse. I have 3 more semesters to go.

lender.name: Leah
lender.loan_because: it's a simple, powerful way to provide opportunities for people who deserve a chance to make a better life for their families.
lender.occupational_info: I do research about health policies in the US and other countries.

lender.name: christina
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Elaine
lender.loan_because: I want to benefit someone directly and instantly..... rather than to an organization with large administrative costs.
lender.occupational_info: Retired

lender.name: The James Gang
lender.loan_because: We have worked for everything we have and admire that trait in others. It also helps boost the economy and gives people the chance to work and move up in the world.
lender.occupational_info: We service Optical equipment that is used to check your eyes and vision.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: It is one way to help someone make more of their life and enrich it. It is one thing all of us can do....help others.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a contractual management company that provides services around the world.

lender.name: amanda
lender.loan_because: i can! while i wish i had more money to be creative with, i think it's amazing to see how far just a little bit can stretch in someone else's hands...
lender.occupational_info: i create metal and/or porcelain crowns, bridges, and veneers for the dental field...

lender.name: Shana
lender.loan_because: I am a woman who has been building a business for the last 4yrs. I understand the need for help, in order to achieving a successful business.
lender.occupational_info: Makeup artist, skin care specialist.

lender.name: Victoria & Louis
lender.loan_because: We are our brothers keeper - Also, as I heard on the television the other day.... I am "selfish" ~ this makes me feel good : )

lender.name: Dina
lender.loan_because: I have 4 beautiful daughters and no sons but as of Sept 3, 2007 my eldest daughter Tareysa-Maria got married and his name is '"Juan" Finally a son!!!

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: We should all share our blessings with others in need.

lender.name: Vicky
lender.loan_because: Sometimes what seems like a relatively small amount to me can make huge difference in the life of someone else - and that impacts many more people in turn.

lender.name: Laurie
lender.loan_because: What a way to help someone, help themselves!

lender.name: Belinda
lender.loan_because: I was so excited to hear about the opportunity to help others so significantly with so little. I have been helped by others in my life and hope to pass on my gifts.
lender.occupational_info: I work with patients who are injured in their jobs with medical care and returning to work.

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: I was born in South Africa, moved to the US when I was a teen and feel that this is an opportunity for me to give back to Africa.

lender.name: Derek
lender.loan_because: We BOOMERS have had it so good for so long ... time to help someone else.

lender.name: Holly
lender.loan_because: I feel that I have been blessed by having opportunities in my country. I wish to help others reach their dreams, one donation at a time!
lender.occupational_info: I am an elementary school teacher, and I love what I do!

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I love to help people.

lender.name: Bernadine
lender.loan_because: I have 5 beautiful grandchildren and hopefully teach them about giving and learning about all cultures.
lender.occupational_info: I have been a life long learner in my senior years I have only touch the beginning of my journey.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I believe as families we can make a difference. No matter how hard up we are.
lender.occupational_info: I book travel for people who want to see the world.

lender.name: Malena
lender.loan_because:
I know I can make a huge difference to a life. This is an awesome idea that I want everyone to know about.
Se que puedo tener impacto en la vida de alguien. Esta es una idea genial y quiero que todo el mundo sepa de Kiva.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: I am a woman trying to build a small business. I understand the need for help, to try and achieve a successful business
lender.occupational_info: I have a homebased travel business. I love it ! I am having a blast and my goal is to make more money so I can help more people!

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I started my own business and now want to help others become successful with their own businesses too.
lender.occupational_info: I design projects such as advertisements, newsletters, brochures, posters, websites, etc.

lender.name: Evelyn
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: Agriculture. We grow alfalfa.

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: Its a wonderful way to share with others because I am so blessed.

lender.name: Kerri
lender.occupational_info: I'm a mom who loves to sew and make clothing, but I work with computers for a job.

lender.name: Alison
lender.loan_because: I care -- it's that simple.
lender.occupational_info: I help people sell and buy houses and land.

lender.name: Cathy
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help someone less fortunate than myself to achieve their hopes and dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I currently work as an intensive care unit nurse, caring for the sickest patients.

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: God has been very good to me. I believe His admonition to Abraham--"I have blessed you so that you will be a blessing to others"--applies to me as well.
lender.occupational_info: I am a nurse working in an AIDS clinic. I have visited Africa twice and saw what AIDS is doing to the people there. I also witnessed the amazing resilience of the African people. This is one small way I can encourage them.

lender.name: Laurel
lender.loan_because: I would not have been able to grow into the person that I am without the assistant of others.
lender.occupational_info: I help pharmaceutical and device companies get the clinical trials completed for submission to FDA for approval. I am also an artist & work on providing inspirational art to people who have terminal or chronic illnesses.

lender.name: Edith
lender.loan_because: I love to help people help them selves by lending a hand-up not a hand -out.
lender.occupational_info: I provide drug-free health care to eleviate needless suffering from chronic joint and muscle pain.

lender.name: Emily
lender.occupational_info: I am a student studying to be a teacher because I like working with kids. Specifically I like working with children with special needs.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who want to help themselves
lender.occupational_info: Distributor of over 1 million different promotional items that can be decorated with your logo or slogan. Clients are businesses who wish to promote their business or launch a new product.

lender.name: uscity.net
lender.loan_because: We believe that we are all here to help each other.
lender.occupational_info: We are a US website directory with links to businesses plus an online phone book with white pages, and yellow pages, weather, news, sports, a hotel finder, real estate and apartment finder, free credit reports, national and local parks, movie times and much more,

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a WONDERFUL organization and when I learned about it I knew immediately that I had to get involved. It literally is the gift that keeps on giving. I've loaned out the same $50 I started with 9 times and am starting to add more each year.

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: I have so much and must return graciously to people who can grow and gain independence
lender.occupational_info: full time caregiver, in our home, for the elderly. We presently have 22.

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: It's more fun to give!
lender.occupational_info: I stay home and take care of children who are in state custody. Something has happened in their lives that they were not safe at home.

lender.name: Christina & Scott
lender.loan_because: We feel blessed to be happy , healthy and have jobs that afford us the ability to share with others.

lender.name: Donovan
lender.loan_because: It helps people and gets me service hours to graduate.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school, and am trying to raise money to help you guys by playing music.

lender.name: Johnny
lender.loan_because: I have owned and operated a small buisiness, and understand how hard it is to get the buisiness up and running.
lender.occupational_info: I repair large earth moving equipment

lender.name: Martin and Kimberly
lender.loan_because: We want to feed Him when He is hungry, give Him a drink when He is thirsty, and invite Him in when He is a stranger.
lender.occupational_info: Martin is physician training in internal medicine and Kimberly is teaching their son how to be good.

lender.name: pam
lender.loan_because: in loving memory of my husband. don't like being a young widow, but then who does?
lender.occupational_info: worked in tv production after college. then was a senior medical editor for product liability lawsuits - all death & gloom. later, i drove a truck for an electric utility so i could write at work. now, i do what i want...write & take photographs.

lender.name: Niamh
lender.loan_because: I started my own business in 2001. Then in 2006 I started a networking group in my community to help other small businesses grow, profit, and provide for their families. It gives me great joy now to be able to help someone else grow their business. Thank you for the opportunity and congratulations to the organizers of Kiva !
lender.occupational_info: I assist individuals and families with plans on how to save money for their needs now and for their future

lender.name: Jacqueline
lender.loan_because: I feel it is something Christ wants me to do.
lender.occupational_info: I write documents to help users understand how to use our software product.

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: At the risk of sounding like a cliche' No one can do everything, everyone can do something, and if we all do something , it WILL change the world. It sounds too simple to be effective in a big complicated world, but it just may be that it is the ONLY effective way to change the world. I believe with all of my heart that if you are going to walk this planet and use the resources , you MUST give something back and if all you have is a dime, because the rent is due and the car is in the shop, and the hospital bills are pouring in, then give that dime. Just give it. It will change your life. The very best way that I have found to survive the tough times is to do something for someone else. You don't have to be able to do some huge thing in order to be effective and make a difference in someones life. For that reason, I am glad that I found Kiva.

lender.name: Marc
lender.loan_because: I would like to help those less fortunate
lender.occupational_info: I am an Ear, Nose, and Throat surgeon

lender.name: Heather and Jeff
lender.occupational_info: I work for the largest software maker in the world, Microsoft. As does my employer, my family and I believe strongly in helping those in need around the world.

lender.name: dianne
lender.loan_because: i like to help people in need

lender.name: Felice
lender.occupational_info: ultrasound tech

lender.name: TomFam
lender.loan_because: We can and must!
lender.occupational_info: giving back

lender.name: Cecil & Geraldine
lender.loan_because: Having visited Nicaragua twice, I feel connected to the area and want to help those who are helping themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I'm retired, but recently became involved with Soroptimist International of Santa Rosa. See my blog at: http://sisr-gerryruth.blogspot.com/

lender.name: nigel
lender.loan_because: i feel i would like to help others
lender.occupational_info: i detail cars on a Saturday and a Tuesday Morning from 6.00 am to 10.00 am I clean 10 cars inside and out

lender.name: Carrol J.
lender.loan_because: It is a honor to reach out to other people and let them know we care and want to help our fellow mankind. Thanks to KIVA

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: giving a gift that would just cover dinner and a movie can actually transform someone's life....and their children's future.
lender.occupational_info: I create DVDs from personal photos and video clips. It is put to music and enhanced with many special effects. Specializing in DVD creation for special events such as weddings, birthdays, and anniversaries.
